subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|運河|うんが}}: [[canal]]
* {{ja-r|河馬|かば}}: a [[hippopotamus]]
* {{ja-r|銀河|ぎんが}}: a [[galaxy]]; the [[Milky Way]]
* {{ja-r|決河|けっか}}: the act of a river [[breach]]ing a [[dike]] or [[dam]] due to [[flood]]; a river thus [[overflow]]ing
* {{ja-r|山河|さんが}}: [[mountain]]s and [[river]]s
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|大%河|たい%が}}: a [[large]] river
* {{ja-r|渡河|とか}}: the act of [[ford]]ing a [[river]]
* {{ja-r|氷河|ひょうが}}: a [[glacier]]
* {{ja-r|河豚|ふぐ}}, {{ja-r|河豚|かとん}}: a [[fugu]], a [[blowfish]] or [[pufferfish]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かわ}}

# {{lb|ja|mahjong|sort=かわ}} river: a player's discard pile
